report.title: Enough Is as Good as a Feast
report.author: Dr. Demento
report.bodytext: My friends and I have been experimenting with 2c-i for the last several weeks. Our last trip was a good example. I will describe three psychonauts: /n 1. (Yours truly) A 220-lb male, who took 16mg /n 2. A 180-lb male, 12mg. Had just done two lines of cocaine. /n 3. A 210-lb male, 17.5 mg /n 4. A 110-lb female, 12mg /n /n All ingested at about 7:30 pm on an empty stomach. First effects were noted sooner than anticipated at about thirty minutes, manifested by a feeling of energy and a tendency to grin and giggle. At about 45 minutes, mild nausea was encountered. Subject 2 vomited once. (He mentioned that cocaine makes him nauseous at times). /n /n Visuals started at about the 1 hour mark and were most enjoyable for about 2-3 hours. A simple pattern on the TV screen seemed to shift and change color. A rhinestone on subject 4's shoe seemed to be animated. Subject 3 saw rich patterns in the clouds. Subject 1 noted that everything seemed to take on an extra dimension. Pictures seemed three-dimensional. A Buddha statue seemed alive. /n /n Subjects were for the most part giggly and euphoric. Subject 2 even with the reduced dose seemed slightly overwhelmed by it all. Subject 1 noted that it was easy to perceive the emotional state of others, but not easy to vibe with that state necessarily. /n /n Effects lasted until about 3am. Difficult to fall asleep. The next morning, vision seemed off, with poor depth perception. /n /n Our recommendations: /n /n 1. A peron might have to try this substance at least twice to get a good feel for it. /n 2. 12mg is a good dose for a lightweight, 15-17.5 for a big boy. Enough is as good as a feast. Take it all at once if you plan to get any sleep at all. /n 3. If you have a sensitive stomach, think about taking some ginger or cannibis prior to dropping 2c-i. /n 4. Don't even think about driving until 18 h post dose. /n 5. Alcohol just covers up the effects and makes the trip much less enjoyable. Cocaine might accentuate the body load. /n 6. Don't take this and go someplace where people fight a lot. You will consistently underestimate how much your spastically peppy euphoria is irritating the other people at the bar. /n /n Subject 2 was not impressed. 1, 3, and 4 however felt the experience was beautiful. /n /n This is not a deep experience, or maybe it is. Here is what I think it all means. /n /n We live in the midst of almost unbearable beauty, every day, all the time. We simply choose not to see it. Look closely at a child's eyes sometime. They are incredibly bright and clear. Imagine how beautiful colors look through those eyes. How amazing a butterfly must seem, through those eyes. How rich the imagery in clouds. How brilliant lights are. That's what it is like.
